None that I am aware of except=
 for the 'Tyrx Chronicles' which suck, 
but they are located on the fsgames=
.com site.  The point was to have a 
central location finding new gladiator=
 scenarios and well, what better 
place than here.

Another thing that make=
s a good scenario (as pointed out by Telvido) 
is variation in character ty=
pes/names.  Nobody wants to want an army 
of 100% unnamed any type characte=
r.  In my 'Hedge Free At Last', it 
may be almost all druids, but they all =
have names and the names have 
meaning.  BTW, Telvido, how does my 'Hedge F=
ree At Last' rate as far 
as a maze goes?
